Waterproof Flashlight.embed: {"title":"Waterproof Flashlight","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":600}],"description":"For, you know, seeing. In the dark. Yes.  Waterproof.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.274"}}

Chemistry Set.embed: {"title":"Chemistry Set","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":1000}],"description":"Used to create Repels, Potions, and other objects.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.284"}}

Collection Jar.embed: {"title":"Collection Jar","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":100}],"description":"A simple sealable glass jar. Useful when collecting Items from Pok\u00e9mon, such as Honey from Pok\u00e9mon with the Honey Gather Ability, or MooMoo Milk from Pok\u00e9mon with the Milk Collection Ability. Available almost everywhere.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.274"}}

First Aid Kit.embed: {"title":"First Aid Kit","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":500}],"description":"Required to use the First Aid Expertise Feature. By Draining 1 AP, any Trainer can make a Medicine Education Check on a target as an Extended Action. The target gains Hit Points equal to the result, and is cured of Burn, Poison, and Paralysis.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.274"}}

Fishing Lure.embed: {"title":"Fishing Lure","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":1500}],"description":"Instead of Bait, some trainers may opt to use a Fishing Lure when attempting to Fish. Fishing Lures work just like Bait, but can be used multiple times. If the line snaps or the fish gets away, they may take your lure with them, however.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.274"}}

Saddle.embed: {"title":"Saddle","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":2000}],"description":"Saddles help Trainers ride Pok\u00e9mon. They are created with a specific Pok\u00e9mon species in mind, and only Pok\u00e9mon with that body type can wear the saddle. A common Saddle type fits Ponyta, Rapidash, Blitzle, and Zebstrika, for example. Saddles grant a +3 bonus to all Skill Checks made to mount Pok\u00e9mon, or to remain on the Saddle when hit by an attack.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.274"}}

Water Filter.embed: {"title":"Water Filter","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":500}],"description":"Can ensure that river or pond water is clean to drink after being filtered.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.274"}}

Max Repel.embed: {"title":"Max Repel","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":400}],"description":"Lasts 5 hours; causes Pok\u00e9mon of level 35 or lower to flee.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.275"}}

Basic Rope.embed: {"title":"Basic Rope","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":100}],"description":"Basic Fiber Rope. Has a tensile strength of 35 kg or 77 lbs. It has 5 Hit Points.\n\nRope can only be damaged by Fire-Type attacks, attacks made with sharp objects(knives, swords, sharp teeth), and moves like Scratch, Slash, Leaf Blade, Razor Leaf, etc. The Move Cut ignores all Damage Reduction against Rope. Rope can be bought in any length of 25 ft up to 300.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.274"}}

Utility Rope.embed: {"title":"Utility Rope","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":200}],"description":"Braided Utility Rope. Has a tensile strength of 80 kg or 176 lbs. It has 20 Hit Points and 10 Damage Reduction.\n\nRope can only be damaged by Fire-Type attacks, attacks made with sharp objects(knives, swords, sharp teeth), and moves like Scratch, Slash, Leaf Blade, Razor Leaf, etc. The Move Cut ignores all Damage Reduction against Rope. Rope can be bought in any length of 25 ft up to 300.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.274"}}

Sturdy Rope.embed: {"title":"Sturdy Rope","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":400}],"description":"Sturdy Rope with a tensile strength of 225 kg or roughly 500lbs. 30 Hit Points and 20 Damage Reduction.\n\nRope can only be damaged by Fire-Type attacks, attacks made with sharp objects(knives, swords, sharp teeth), and moves like Scratch, Slash, Leaf Blade, Razor Leaf, etc. The Move Cut ignores all Damage Reduction against Rope. Rope can be bought in any length of 25 ft up to 300.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.274"}}

Sleeping Bag.embed: {"title":"Sleeping Bag","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":1000}],"description":"A standard sleeping bag.  Holds one person.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.274"}}

Sleeping Bag (Double).embed: {"title":"Sleeping Bag (Double)","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":1800}],"description":"A standard sleeping bag.  Holds two people.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.274"}}

Lighter.embed: {"title":"Lighter","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":150}],"description":"For creating flames in a hurry.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.274"}}

Super Repel.embed: {"title":"Super Repel","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":300}],"description":"Lasts 2 hours; causes Pok\u00e9mon of level 25 or lower to flee.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.275"}}

Cooking Set.embed: {"title":"Cooking Set","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":1000}],"description":"Used by Chefs to create Snacks and Refreshments.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.284"}}

Red Shard.embed: {"title":"Red Shard","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":"--"}],"description":"Associated with Fire, Fairy, & Psychic.  With Gem Lore, 4 can be combined into a Fire Stone.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.284"}}

Flashlight.embed: {"title":"Flashlight","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":200}],"description":"For, you know, seeing. In the dark. Yes.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.274"}}

Tent.embed: {"title":"Tent","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":"400\/m^3"}],"description":"Standard outdoor tents. Provide protection from the elements of nature. A small one person tent would be about 1m x 1.5m x 1.5m, or 2.25 cubic meters\u2013 meaning 900 in price.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.274"}}

Waterproof Lighter.embed: {"title":"Waterproof Lighter","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":1000}],"description":"For creating flames in a hurry.  Waterproof.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.274"}}

Repel.embed: {"title":"Repel","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":200}],"description":"Lasts 1 hour; causes Pok\u00e9mon of level 15 or lower to flee.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.275"}}

Groomer's Kit.embed: {"title":"Groomer's Kit","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":500}],"description":"Used by Trainers with the Groomer Edge to clean their Pok\u00e9mon.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.298"}}

Yellow Shard.embed: {"title":"Yellow Shard","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":"--"}],"description":"Associated with Electric, Rock, & Steel.  With Gem Lore, 4 can be combined into a Thunder Stone.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.284"}}

Reanimation Machine.embed: {"title":"Reanimation Machine","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":"Varies"}],"description":"Can be used to revive Fossils. Reanimation Machines also come in a smaller but more expensive Portable variety. Prices are up to GM discretion, often upwards of $10,000. See the Pok\u00e9mon Fossils section for more details (page 216).","footer":{"text":"Core: p.298"}}

Poffin.embed: {"title":"Poffin","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":500}],"description":"Raises one Contest Stat by +1 Contest Die. See Poffin Mixer for details on stat selection.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.284"}}

Egg Warmer (Item).embed: {"title":"Egg Warmer","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":2500}],"description":"Egg Warmers are insulated cases that carry up to four Pok\u00e9mon Eggs and protect them from harm. They also cause Pok\u00e9mon to hatch twice as fast; each day spent in an Egg Warmer counts as 2 days for the purposes of Hatch Rate.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.298"}}

Pok\u00e9 Ball Tool Box.embed: {"title":"Pok\u00e9 Ball Tool Box","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":500}],"description":"These tool boxes let those with the know-how craft and repair Pok\u00e9 Balls.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.284"}}

Mulch.embed: {"title":"Mulch","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":200}],"description":"Mulch may be used to temporarily increase soil Quality; it may be applied to a Plant to increase the Soil Quality of a plant by +1 for the following day. This cannot make a Soil Quality go above +2.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.280"}}

Green Shard.embed: {"title":"Green Shard","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":"--"}],"description":"Associated with Bug, Grass, & Ground.  With Gem Lore, 4 can be combined into a Leaf Stone.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.284"}}

Blue Shard.embed: {"title":"Blue Shard","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":"--"}],"description":"Associated with Water, Ice, & Flying.  With Gem Lore, 4 can be combined into a Water Stone.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.284"}}

Violet Shard.embed: {"title":"Violet Shard","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":"--"}],"description":"Associated with Poison, Dark, & Ghost.  With Gem Lore, 4 can be combined into a Dusk Stone.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.284"}}

Portable Grower.embed: {"title":"Portable Grower","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":2000}],"description":"Portable Growers can be used to grow berries and herbs. Portable Growers protect the plants within them from external weather, and never need to be fertilized. Each Grower holds one plant.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.284"}}

Lum Berry.embed: {"title":"Lum Berry","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":250}],"description":"Cures any single status ailment. Tier 2.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.282"}}

Mago Berry.embed: {"title":"Mago Berry","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":250}],"description":"Sweet Treat, Cute Poffin Ingredient. Tier 2.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.282"}}

Enigma Berry.embed: {"title":"Enigma Berry","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":250}],"description":"User gains Temporary HP equal to 1\/6th of their Max HP when hit by a Super Effective Move. Tier 2.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.282"}}

Spelon Berry.embed: {"title":"Spelon Berry","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":250}],"description":"Cool or Beauty Poffin Ingredient. Tier 2.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.282"}}

Pomeg Berry.embed: {"title":"Pomeg Berry","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":500}],"description":"Lowers HP stat by 1 with trainer permission. Tier 3.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.283"}}

Cheri Berry.embed: {"title":"Cheri Berry","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":150}],"description":"Cures Paralysis, Cool Poffin Ingredient. Tier 1.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.282"}}

Colbur Berry.embed: {"title":"Colbur Berry","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":500}],"description":"Weakens foe\u2019s super effective Dark-type move. Tier 3.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.283"}}

Maranga Berry.embed: {"title":"Maranga Berry","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":500}],"description":"+1 Special Defense CS. Activates as a Free Action when hit by a Special Move. Tier 3.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.283"}}

Power Herb.embed: {"title":"Power Herb","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":300}],"description":"Eliminates the Set-Up turn of Moves with the Set-Up Keyword.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.281"}}

Balm Mushroom.embed: {"title":"Balm Mushroom","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":"--"}],"description":"The user is cured of Burn, Paralysis, or Poison. If they are, they lose 1 Combat Stage in a random Stat.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.281"}}

Leaf Stone.embed: {"title":"Leaf Stone","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":3000}],"description":"Evolves Gloom, Weepinbell, Exeggcute, Eevee, Nuzleaf, Pansage","footer":{"text":"Core: p.298"}}

Moon Ball.embed: {"title":"Moon Ball","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":800},{"name":"Mod","value":"+0"}],"description":"-20 Modifier if the target evolves with an Evolution Stone.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.272"}}

Gas Mask.embed: {"title":"Gas Mask","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":1500},{"name":"Slot","value":"Head"}],"description":"Gas Masks are invaluable equipment when trying to breathe in toxic environments or heavy smoke. They not only let you breathe through environmental toxins or smoke, but you become immune to the Moves Rage Powder, Poison Gas, Poisonpowder, Sleep Powder, Smog, Smokescreen, Spore, Stun Spore, and Sweet Scent.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.293"}}

Aerodactylite.embed: {"title":"Aerodactylite","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":"--"}],"description":"Mega Evolves Aerodactyl when used in conjuction with a Mega Ring.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.297"}}

Beedrillite.embed: {"title":"Beedrillite","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":"--"}],"description":"Mega Evolves Beedrill when used in conjuction with a Mega Ring.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.297"}}

Galladite.embed: {"title":"Galladite","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":"--"}],"description":"Mega Evolves Gallade when used in conjuction with a Mega Ring.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.297"}}

Heracronite.embed: {"title":"Heracronite","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":"--"}],"description":"Mega Evolves Heracross when used in conjuction with a Mega Ring.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.297"}}

Manectite.embed: {"title":"Manectite","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":"--"}],"description":"Mega Evolves Manectric when used in conjuction with a Mega Ring.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.297"}}

Tyranitarite.embed: {"title":"Tyranitarite","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":"--"}],"description":"Mega Evolves Tyranitar when used in conjuction with a Mega Ring.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.297"}}

Dimensional Field Analyzer.embed: {"title":"Dimensional Field Analyzer","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":5000},{"name":"Slot","value":"Item"}],"description":"A handheld device the size of a Geiger counter for campaigns featuring time travel or interdimensional travel of some other sort. This device can be calibrated to recognize a \u2018home\u2019 universe or timeline and can measure the amount of difference between a parallel universe and that home universe.","footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.43"}}

Revival Herb.embed: {"title":"Revival Herb","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":350}],"description":"Revives Pok\u00e9mon and sets to 50% Hit Points - Repulsive","footer":{"text":"Core: p.281"}}

X Attack.embed: {"title":"X Attack","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":350}],"description":"Increases the Pok\u00e9mon\u2019s Attack by two Combat Stages","footer":{"text":"Core: p.276"}}

X Defend.embed: {"title":"X Defend","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":350}],"description":"Increases the Pok\u00e9mon\u2019s Defense by two Combat Stages","footer":{"text":"Core: p.276"}}

X Special.embed: {"title":"X Special","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":350}],"description":"Increases the Pok\u00e9mon\u2019s Special Attack by two Combat Stages","footer":{"text":"Core: p.276"}}

X Speed.embed: {"title":"X Speed","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":350}],"description":"Increases the Pok\u00e9mon\u2019s Speed by two Combat Stages","footer":{"text":"Core: p.276"}}

Dire Hit.embed: {"title":"Dire Hit","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":600}],"description":"Increases Critical Hit Range of all moves by +2.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.276"}}

Poultices.embed: {"title":"Poultices","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":225}],"description":"Poultices are applied as Extended Actions on Pok\u00e9mon or Trainers. Poultices last for 6 hours; while applied, they double the Natural Healing Rate of Pok\u00e9mon or Trainers, meaning a Pok\u00e9mon or Trainer will heal 1\/8th of their Hit Points per half hour. Poultices also immediately heal one Injury if they remain in place for their full duration.\n\nIf a Pok\u00e9mon is damaged or loses Hit Points in any way, the Poulticess immediately stop working.  Poultices are itchy and irritating to the skin and may cause loyalty loss.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.277"}}

HP Up.embed: {"title":"HP Up","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":4900}],"description":"Raise the user\u2019s HP Base Stat 1.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.299"}}

Protein.embed: {"title":"Protein","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":4900}],"description":"Raise the user\u2019s Attack Base Stat 1.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.299"}}

Calcium.embed: {"title":"Calcium","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":4900}],"description":"Raise the user\u2019s Special Attack Base Stat 1.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.299"}}

Zinc.embed: {"title":"Zinc","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":4900}],"description":"Raise the user\u2019s Special Defense Base Stat 1.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.299"}}

Carbos.embed: {"title":"Carbos","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":4900}],"description":"Raise the user\u2019s Speed Base Stat 1.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.299"}}

Heart Booster.embed: {"title":"Heart Booster","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":9800}],"description":"The Pok\u00e9mon gains 2 Tutor Points. Use only one per Pok\u00e9mon.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.299"}}

PP Up.embed: {"title":"PP Up","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":9800}],"description":"Raise one of the user\u2019s Move\u2019s Frequency one level. Use only one per Pok\u00e9mon.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.299"}}

Heart Scale.embed: {"title":"Heart Scale","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":"--"}],"description":"Can be used to make Heart Boosters.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.299"}}

X Sp. Def.embed: {"title":"X Sp. Def.","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":350}],"description":"Increases the Pok\u00e9mon\u2019s Special Defense by two Combat Stages","footer":{"text":"Core: p.276"}}

Full Restore.embed: {"title":"Full Restore","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":1450}],"description":"Heals a Pok\u00e9mon for 80 Hit Points and cures any Status Afflictions","footer":{"text":"Core: p.276"}}

Revive.embed: {"title":"Revive","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":300}],"description":"Revives fainted Pok\u00e9mon and sets to 20 Hit Points","footer":{"text":"Core: p.276"}}

Heal Powder.embed: {"title":"Heal Powder","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":350}],"description":"Cure all Persistent Status Afflictions \u2013 Repulsive","footer":{"text":"Core: p.276"}}

Guard Spec.embed: {"title":"Guard Spec","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":700}],"description":"Prevents reduction of Combat Stages or Accuracy on the Pok\u00e9mon for 5 Turns","footer":{"text":"Core: p.276"}}

Iron.embed: {"title":"Iron","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":4900}],"description":"Raise the user\u2019s Defense Base Stat 1.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.299"}}

Candy Bar.embed: {"title":"Candy Bar","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":75}],"description":"Snack. Grants a Digestion Buff that heals 5 Hit Points.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.278"}}

Stat Suppressants.embed: {"title":"Stat Suppressants","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":500}],"description":"These medicines have an identical effect to the Suppressant Berries \u2013 they lower one of the user\u2019s Base Stats by 1 point and only function if the Trainer of the Pok\u00e9mon wants them to.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.299"}}

Puissance Pellet.embed: {"title":"Puissance Pellet","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":450}],"description":"This painkiller and adrenaline injection lets the user temporarily ignore their debilitating injuries. A user with 5 or more injuries does not suffer Hit Point loss equal to their number of injuries when taking Standard Actions. If you are using the optional rule to decrease combat stages for each Injury, the user ignores these combat stage losses. This effect lasts for 5 turns, and at the end of the effect, the user automatically takes another injury.","footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.47"}}

Oxygenation Vial.embed: {"title":"Oxygenation Vial","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":500}],"description":"These vials contain a solution of oxygen-encasing lipids that are injected directly into the bloodstream. One injection is enough to allow the user to go without breathing for up to thirty minutes. Subsequent injections extend the effect, but each one after the first in a 24 hour period causes the user to take one injury as their body suffers complications from the imbalance caused by the solution. These are often carried as a last resort device for astronauts and deep sea divers, as well as used by EMTs to stabilize patients.","footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.47"}}

Locus Lozenge.embed: {"title":"Locus Lozenge","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":500}],"description":"A drug to help the user focus on a single task. The user gains a +3 bonus to Focus and Intuition checks for the next hour but suffers a -4 penalty to Perception checks to notice outside events.","footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.47"}}

Prescient Powder.embed: {"title":"Prescient Powder","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":2500}],"description":"An illegal and dangerous substance produced by desert-dwelling Steelix. Taking the drug inflicts 3 injuries on the user and allows them to use either a Scry or Augury once. The user also gains the Psychic Navigator Edge for two hours. Habitual use of the drug can lead to addiction and health problems.","footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.47"}}

Anti-Radiation Pills.embed: {"title":"Anti-Radiation Pills","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":400}],"description":"An advanced version of the real life potassium iodide pills. These not only protect the thyroid but instead guard against all forms of radiation poisoning, granting the user Hazard Immunity for radioactive environments only for 24 hours.","footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.47"}}

Rambo Roids.embed: {"title":"Rambo Roids","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":750}],"description":"The user treats their Power Capability as increased by 2 for the next hour. However, each time they lift an object or perform a feat of strength beyond their normal means, they must make an Athletics check with a DC of 12. If they fail, they take an Injury immediately. Each such feat of strength induces a cumulative -1 penalty to these Athletics checks.","footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.47"}}

White Light.embed: {"title":"White Light","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":800}],"description":"So named for the soft white glow the liquid gives off, White Light is a crude \u201ctruth serum\u201d. It is slow-acting, taking upwards of an hour to take full effect on a victim. The victim becomes more suggestible and gullible. All of their Guile, Intuition, and Focus Checks made during an interrogation are subject to a -5 penalty.","footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.48"}}

Spritz Spray.embed: {"title":"Spritz Spray","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":250}],"description":"A drug that improves reflexes at the cost of mental focus. The user of Spritz gains +5 initiative and +1 Evasion for the next 5 rounds of combat but suffers a -3 penalty to Perception and Focus checks for the next hour.","footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.48"}}

Soldier Pill.embed: {"title":"Soldier Pill","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":750}],"description":"A potentially dangerous stimulant that provides the user enough energy to go 24 hours without sleep. Upon taking the pill twice in a 48 hour period, the user begins to take 1 injury every 2 hours until they choose to go to sleep. The user of a Soldier Pill gets a +3 bonus to rolls to wake up from Sleep.","footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.48"}}

Shock Syringe.embed: {"title":"Shock Syringe","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":500}],"description":"This drug enhances the sensitivity of the user\u2019s nerves, enhancing their perception and making it incredibly useful for scouts and recon missions. However, the enhanced sense of touch greatly lowers the user\u2019s pain tolerance. The user gains a +3 bonus to Perception, Focus, and Guile and a +1 bonus to Accuracy. However, each time the user takes an Injury, they are Flinched. The effects of Shock Syringe last for an hour.","footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.48"}}

Leftovers.embed: {"title":"Leftovers","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":350}],"description":"Snack. When their Digestion Buff is traded in, the user recovers 1\/16th of their max Hit Points at the beginning of each turn for the rest of the encounter.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.132"}}

Honey.embed: {"title":"Honey","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":100}],"description":"Snack. Grants a Digestion Buff that heals 5 Hit Points. May be used as Bait","footer":{"text":"Core: p.278"}}

Black Sludge.embed: {"title":"Black Sludge","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":500}],"description":"Poison-Type Pok\u00e9mon may consume the Black Sludge as a Snack Item; when the Digestion Buff is traded in, they recover 1\/8th of their Max Hit Points at the beginning of each turn for the rest of the encounter.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.278"}}

Figy Berry.embed: {"title":"Figy Berry","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":250}],"description":"Spicy Treat, Cool Poffin Ingredient. Tier 2.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.282"}}

Wiki Berry.embed: {"title":"Wiki Berry","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":250}],"description":"Dry Treat, Beauty Poffin Ingredient. Tier 2.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.282"}}

Aguav Berry.embed: {"title":"Aguav Berry","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":250}],"description":"Bitter Treat, Smart Poffin Ingredient. Tier 2.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.282"}}

Iapapa Berry.embed: {"title":"Iapapa Berry","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":250}],"description":"Sour Treat, Tough Poffin Ingredient. Tier 2.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.282"}}

Lansat Berry.embed: {"title":"Lansat Berry","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":250}],"description":"Increases Critical Range by +1 for the remainder of the encounter. Tier 2.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.282"}}

Starf Berry.embed: {"title":"Starf Berry","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":250}],"description":"+2 CS to a random Stat. May be used only at 25% HP or lower. Tier 2.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.282"}}

Jaboca Berry.embed: {"title":"Jaboca Berry","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":250}],"description":"Foe dealing Physical Damage to the user loses 1\/8 of their Maximum HP. Tier 2.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.282"}}

Rowap Berry.embed: {"title":"Rowap Berry","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":250}],"description":"Foe dealing Special Damage to the user loses 1\/8 of their Maximum HP. Tier 2.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.282"}}

Pamtre Berry.embed: {"title":"Pamtre Berry","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":250}],"description":"Cute or Beauty Poffin Ingredient. Tier 2.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.282"}}

Watmel Berry.embed: {"title":"Watmel Berry","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":250}],"description":"Cute or Smart Poffin Ingredient. Tier 2.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.282"}}

Durin Berry.embed: {"title":"Durin Berry","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":250}],"description":"Smart or Tough Poffin Ingredient. Tier 2.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.282"}}

Belue Berry.embed: {"title":"Belue Berry","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":250}],"description":"Cool or Tough Poffin Ingredient. Tier 2.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.282"}}

Kelpsy Berry.embed: {"title":"Kelpsy Berry","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":500}],"description":"Lowers Attack stat by 1 with trainer permission. Tier 3.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.283"}}

Qualot Berry.embed: {"title":"Qualot Berry","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":500}],"description":"Lowers Defense stat by 1 with trainer permission. Tier 3.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.283"}}

Hondew Berry.embed: {"title":"Hondew Berry","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":500}],"description":"Lowers Special Attack stat by 1 with trainer permission. Tier 3.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.283"}}

Grepa Berry.embed: {"title":"Grepa Berry","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":500}],"description":"Lowers Special Defense stat by 1 with trainer permission. Tier 3.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.283"}}

Chesto Berry.embed: {"title":"Chesto Berry","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":150}],"description":"Cures Sleep, Beauty Poffin Ingredient. Tier 1.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.282"}}

Pecha Berry.embed: {"title":"Pecha Berry","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":150}],"description":"Cures Poison, Cute Poffin Ingredient. Tier 1.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.282"}}

Rawst Berry.embed: {"title":"Rawst Berry","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":150}],"description":"Cures Burn, Smart Poffin Ingredient. Tier 1.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.282"}}

Aspear Berry.embed: {"title":"Aspear Berry","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":150}],"description":"Cures Freeze, Tough Poffin Ingredient. Tier 1","footer":{"text":"Core: p.282"}}

Sour Candy.embed: {"title":"Sour Candy","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":100}],"description":"The user may trade in this Snack\u2019s Digestion Buff when being hit by a Physical Attack to increase their Damage Reduction by +5 against that attack. If the user prefers Sour Food, they gain +10 Damage Reduction instead. If the user dislikes Sour Food, they become Enraged.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.132"}}

Dry Wafer.embed: {"title":"Dry Wafer","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":100}],"description":"The user may trade in this Snack\u2019s Digestion Buff when making a Special attack to deal +5 additional Damage. Mawilite.embed: {"title":"Mawilite","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":"--"}],"description":"Mega Evolves Mawile when used in conjuction with a Mega Ring.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.297"}}

Spray Case.embed: {"title":"Spray Case","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":800},{"name":"Mod","value":"--"}],"description":"A Spray Case may be filled with a Pester Ball or Repel of any variety. This consumes the used item. Upon hitting a target, the Spray Case is emptied, spraying the item it was filled with onto its target, automatically hitting. This can occur when attempting to catch Pok\u00e9mon (the effect is resolved before the capture roll), or when releasing a Pok\u00e9mon from its Pok\u00e9 Ball (the effect is resolved before the Pok\u00e9mon within is released). Spray Cases may be refilled numerous times, but may only have one sort of consumable in them at a time.","footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.44"}}

Hearty Meal.embed: {"title":"Hearty Meal","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":"--"}],"description":"When consumed, that Trainer gains +2 to their Max AP until the end of their next extended rest. Contest Fashion.embed: {"title":"Contest Fashion","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":1000}],"description":"These Items have a chosen Contest Stat; Beauty, Cool, Cute, Smart, or Tough. Fabulous Ball.embed: {"title":"Fabulous Ball","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":"--"},{"name":"Mod","value":-5}],"description":"The captured Pok\u00e9mon gains +2 dice in the Contest Stat that corresponds to the Stat boosted by their Nature. Bandages.embed: {"title":"Bandages","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":300}],"description":"Bandages are applied as Extended Actions on Pok\u00e9mon or Trainers. Bandages also immediately heal one Injury if they remain in place for their full duration.\n\nIf a Pok\u00e9mon is damaged or loses Hit Points in any way, the Bandages immediately stop working.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.277"}}

Type Brace.embed: {"title":"Type Brace","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":2000}],"description":"These items come in a variety of each of the Elemental Types, and grant the holder 15 Damage Reduction against that specific Type. Accessory Item for Trainers.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.297"}}

Hand Net.embed: {"title":"Hand Net","fields":[{"name":"Cost","value":"Varies"},{"name":"Slot","value":"Hands"}],"description":"A long net, usually on the end of a long stick, these pieces of two-handed Equipment are usually used for bug catching or fishing. As an AC6 Status Attack, you may attempt to net a Small Pok\u00e9mon using this item. If you hit, you manage to scoop up the Pok\u00e9mon, trapping them. You may move with the Pok\u00e9mon, dragging them with you. Pok\u00e9mon may still attack from the Hand Net using long-range attacks, or try to attack the net itself, potentially breaking it and freeing themselves. Capture Rolls against Pok\u00e9mon in a net receive a -20 bonus.\n\nHand Nets with 50 Hit Points cost $100; 100 Hit Points cost $600; and 200 Hit Points cost $1500. Nets aren\u2019t broken until all of their Hit Points are depleted.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.294"}}
